bill.summary: 6/13/1995--Introduced. Omnibus Transportation Employee Testing Act Amendments of 1995 - Amends Federal transportation law to eliminate the requirement for preemployment alcohol testing of: (1) mass transit employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions; (2) railroad employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions; (3) operators of commercial motor vehicles; (4) air carrier employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions; and (5) Federal Aviation Administration employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions. Permits the preemployment testing for the use of alcohol by such employees.
